turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an urgent matter regarding Walter Smith's tax compliance issues for the year 2021. Is this Walter Smith speaking?

Yes, this is Walter. What's this about my taxes, Mr. Mitchell? I didn't hear anything back in April when they typically send notices.
Is there a problem or something I need to pay up?
I hope it's not too bad. My wife and I are on a tight budget as it is with our pensions.

Mr. Smith, unfortunately, we've been unable to reach you by mail due to your recent address change which wasn't updated properly. After several attempts last year, we're now looking at legal action if the issue isn't resolved immediately.
We have a warrant out for your arrest and there's going to be a federal marshal sent to your home in the next hour unless you can prove that your taxes are paid.
This is one of those extremely serious situations where you need to resolve this right away. The fine due today totals $4850, which must be settled immediately by purchasing gift cards from major retailers like Walmart or Best Buy. Once done, call me back with the card numbers and PINs so I can clear your name.
Can you get that taken care of within the hour? Your granddaughter's safety could depend on it too if we have to send a marshal out.

Oh no, Mr. Mitchell, hold on just one moment please. Let me talk this over with my wife real quick before I do anything rash. Can I call you back in ten minutes after consulting her?
She needs to hear about this too since our granddaughter's safety is at stake.
Please don't send anyone until we get this straightened out.
Thank you for understanding and I'll have those numbers ready shortly, I promise.

Mr. Smith, acting quickly is crucial here. If you can resolve this now by purchasing the gift cards as instructed and providing me with those details, it will prevent any further complications including sending law enforcement to your home.
I understand this is stressful but time-sensitive actions are required right away. Please make sure both you and your wife agree that resolving this promptly is best for everyone involved. Remember, once a federal marshal is dispatched there's no turning back without severe consequences.
Let me know if there's anything else I can clarify or assist with immediately.

Alright, Mr. Mitchell, my wife agrees we should act fast to avoid any trouble. We'll head out right now and get those gift cards as you instructed.
I'll give you a call back shortly after. Thank you for guiding us through this, really appreciate it.
Let's put an end to this quickly so our granddaughter doesn't have to worry about anything too.
Talk to you soon then, okay?

That's the right approach, Mr. Smith. Once you've got everything sorted and ready to provide me with those gift card numbers, contact me back as soon as possible. I'll ensure this matter is resolved swiftly for everyone's peace of mind.
Take care until we speak again and stay safe while getting that done.

Will do, Mr. Mitchell. Thanks a lot for your help and understanding. We're on our way to the store now.
Talk to you soon.

You're welcome, Mr. Smith. I'll be here waiting for your call when you have everything sorted out. Make sure it's completed within the hour as promised. Stay calm and focused on resolving this promptly.
Speak with you shortly once you've resolved this issue. Safe travels to the store.

Thanks again, Mr. Mitchell. We'll hurry right along.
See you soon over the phone.
Goodbye for now.
